entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is mentioned as the one who narrowly avoided having his head hit by the Oracle. He is described as being present in the class.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned alongside Seamus and is also present in the class.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as being hit by Professor Trelawney with a copy of the Oracle. He is described as slipping off his pouf due to the force of the throw.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is mentioned as being loud and somewhat hysterical. She is described as having angry tears in her magnified eyes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as thinking he knows what the matter is with Professor Trelawney. He leans his head closer to Ron's and mutters a possible explanation.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being present in the class and having Harry lean his head close to him.

entities.name: parvati patil
entities.description: Parvati Patil is mentioned as speaking up in a hushed voice to ask if there is anything wrong with Professor Trelawney.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is mentioned alongside Parvati Patil and is described as having always admired Professor Trelawney.

relationships.description: Professor Trelawney threw the Oracle at Seamus.
Professor Trelawney threw the Oracle at Dean.
Professor Trelawney threw the Oracle at Neville.
Harry leaned his head close to Ron's and muttered a possible explanation for Professor Trelawney's behavior.
